TopicTitle: Devnote Tuesdays: The "Loose on the Streets of Mexico City" Edition

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0ff9377afa68dc3ad3fe6844aaf1bd38/tumblr_inline_mxnllaqfrd1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/ee091522673ed3e41c820c7e086066a2/tumblr_inline_mxnnmpwhpc1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Hey, everyone! Sorry, but there are no devnotes this week. We’ve been doing a lot of last minute <strong>KerbalKon</strong> business, going in and out of meetings and spending some team bonding time. In fact, the above picture is us touring ruins in Mexico City. Fun stuff!</p>

<p>If you’re still itching for news on what’s coming, make sure you watch <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/"><strong>KerbalKon</strong></a> tomorrow and Friday. You’ll learn everything you wanted to know about 0.23 and then some.</p>

<p></p>

Wooooo

Kerbalkon!

should have been called "Devnote Tuesdays: Wednesday Edition"

Edited December 11, 2013 by KasperVld

Wooooo

Kerbalkon!

should have been called "Devnote Tuesdays: Wednesday Edition"

Devnote Tuesdays; Wednesday Edition: This week's updates will be on Thursday.

In all seriousness I'm glad they're focusing on KerbalKon. Sounds like it will be fun.
And what if some of us have to work during the kerbalkon? I sure hope there will be some recaps after the event...

Wooooo

Kerbalkon!

should have been called "Devnote Tuesdays: Wednesday Edition"

Ugh! Your name wins. I should have chosen that one.
I don't think many people genuinely expected Devnote Tuesday for this week to be much, if anything. A good chunk of KerbalKon pretty much is a giant Devnote Tuesday, after all!

And what if some of us have to work during the kerbalkon? I sure hope there will be some recaps after the event...

You'll be able to watch the recorded streams after each segment.
How can there be any devotes if 0.23 is pretty much ready? (I mean it's releasing 17th of December)
